title: Add Python Sample with Async Support
description: Implemented comprehensive Python sample demonstrating dataclasses, type hints, async functions, and the repository pattern. This file serves as a reference for Python symbol extraction testing.
diff_summary:
+75 lines

Added:
- User dataclass with type hints
- DatabaseConnection class with context manager support
- Async fetch_user_data function
- calculate_fibonacci recursive function
- process_data with filter support
- main() entry point with example usage

Imports:
- typing (List, Dict, Optional)
- dataclasses (@dataclass)
- Standard library (os, sys)

title: Implement Rust Sample with Trait System
description: Created Rust sample showcasing advanced language features including traits, impl blocks, Arc/Mutex for concurrency, and comprehensive error handling with Result types.
diff_summary:
+180 lines

Added:
- User, UserRepository structs
- Status, Error enums
- Repository<T>, Validator traits
- Multiple impl blocks for trait implementations
- Async function with Tokio
- Generic find_first function
- Macro definition (log_info!)
- Unit tests

Dependencies:
- std::collections::HashMap
- std::sync::{Arc, Mutex}
- std::fmt

title: Add TypeScript Sample with Generics
description: Implemented TypeScript sample featuring interfaces, generic classes, abstract classes, and modern async patterns. Demonstrates type system capabilities and ES6+ features.
diff_summary:
+120 lines

Added:
- User interface with type aliases
- Repository<T> generic interface
- InMemoryRepository<T> generic class
- BaseService abstract class
- UserService concrete implementation
- Utility functions (validateEmail, formatDate)
- Higher-order function (createLogger)
- Async generator (fetchUsers)
- Namespace (Utils)

Imports:
- EventEmitter from 'events'
- fs module

title: Create Multi-Language Test Repository
description: Established comprehensive test repository with 10 programming languages to validate parser performance and accuracy. Each language sample follows consistent architecture patterns while demonstrating language-specific features.
diff_summary:
+1,500 lines across 10 files

Languages Added:
- Python (75 LOC)
- TypeScript (120 LOC)
- JavaScript (140 LOC)
- Rust (180 LOC)
- Go (160 LOC)
- C# (200 LOC)
- Java (190 LOC)
- C (220 LOC)
- C++ (210 LOC)
- Ruby (180 LOC)

Common Patterns:
- User model/struct
- Repository implementation
- Service layer
- Utility functions
- Example usage

Expected Symbols: ~200 total

title: Add Test Automation Script
description: Created PowerShell automation script to validate parser functionality across all languages. Script counts files, builds server, runs tests, and provides usage instructions.
diff_summary:
+80 lines

Added:
- File counting by language extension
- Cargo build automation
- Test execution with output capture
- Usage instructions
- Error handling

Features:
- Automatic language detection
- Build status reporting
- Test result summary
- Next steps guidance
